line.comment: * Zero Hour 2.0 - sectors and jump beacons cost upkeep but without additional consequences if you cannot pay
* Add-Ons 1.3: Maintenance cost of both sectors and beacons increased by 50% on insane difficulty.
* Increase maintenance factor if we don't have a Mobile Maintenance Kit and if we're not docked. Doesn't increase if maintenance is free.
* ZH 2.1 fighters deteriorate twice as fast
* to keep the original balance we increase the factor 5 times more. But only if player doesnt use a custom maintenance cycle
* Mordan2 - Here is where we actually pay for maintenance. If the player doesn't have enough in their account, we used to damage all their ships!
* Better to go through all player Outposts first, and if they have funds, we transfer them to the player one at a time until we have enough.
* now remove funds from the outpost

sval.val: Zero Hour 2.0 - sectors and jump beacons cost upkeep but without additional consequences if you cannot pay
Add-Ons 1.3: Maintenance cost of both sectors and beacons increased by 50% on insane difficulty.
Increase maintenance factor if we don't have a Mobile Maintenance Kit and if we're not docked. Doesn't increase if maintenance is free.
ZH 2.1 fighters deteriorate twice as fast
to keep the original balance we increase the factor 5 times more. But only if player doesnt use a custom maintenance cycle
Mordan2 - Here is where we actually pay for maintenance. If the player doesn't have enough in their account, we used to damage all their ships!
Better to go through all player Outposts first, and if they have funds, we transfer them to the player one at a time until we have enough.
now remove funds from the outpost
